playerNumber.description: Indicates if the Player who requested the GameDTO is the Player Number 1 or 2

remotePlayerName.description: The name of the rival of the Player who requested the GameDTO

gameStarted.description: Indicates if the Game has started or it is waiting for a Second Player

turn.description: Indicates whose Player Turn currently is by its Player Number, or 0 if the game has not started yet

turnCounter.description: Indicates the number of Tiles placed in the Board so far

winner.description: Indicates if a Player has won the Game. The winner is the one holding the Turn

draw.description: Indicates there are no more possible movements in the Game

surrendered.description: Indicates that a Player has surrendered and it is no longer playing the Game. The surrendered is the Player holding the Turn

board.description: Layout of the Board of the Game and its contents. Each Tile represented with the PlayerNumber of the Player who played it or a 0 representing and empty tile

winningCombination.description: List of Points [column, row] representing the Tiles on the Board that integrate the Winning Combination. Only shown when there is a Winner for the Game
